valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 15 Oct 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 16 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: High Malin 1033 expected Malin slow-moving, declining 1029 by midday tomorrow

FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, easterly 4 to 6 in northeast, otherwise variable 2 to 4. In north, easterly or southeasterly 4 to 6.

Weather
In south, fog patches in southeast, showers in far west. In north, mainly fair.
Visibility
In south, moderate or good, occasionally very poor in southeast. In north, good.
